Magister Karen:
My name is Karen. I'm a Wizard of the Ivory Tower. What brings you here?
You want to know more about Hellbound, do you? The fallen wizard Beleth is hiding here striving to restore his magical power.
For that reason he has made a deal with Vampires.
Ivory Tower Wizards presume that Beleth is planing to conquer all the continent. That's why we are looking for experienced warriors who can stop him.
All heroes who are ready to fight him and have reached Lv. 85 or higher can go to Hellbound every Saturday from 10:00 till 24:00.
